logs.message: Master Dashboard project initiated - Central hub for all דריו projects
Phase 1 complete: JSON data structure created (index.json + all project schemas)
Phase 2 complete: Dashboard HTML/CSS created - Modern dark mode, responsive, RTL Hebrew support
Phase 3-5 complete: JavaScript functionality - Load data, display projects, task logs, auto-refresh (30s)
Phase 6 complete: Polish and error handling - Loading spinners, error messages, responsive tweaks
logs.next_step: Push to GitHub (awaiting authentication token). Dashboard accessible at http://localhost:8080/projects/dashboard.html

deliverables.name: Dashboard HTML
deliverables.description: Complete interactive dashboard with project tracking, task management, and real-time logs

deliverables.name: Project Index
deliverables.description: Master index of all דריו projects with metadata and status

deliverables.name: Project Schemas
deliverables.description: Individual project definitions with tasks, logs, and metadata

deliverables.name: Task Logs
deliverables.description: Detailed task execution logs with timestamps, artifacts, and status
